name: Tcpserver
tagline: A simple TCP Server for testing, viewing and interacting with TCP data.
body:
TCPServer ========= A simple TCP Server written in C# for testing, viewing and interacting with TCP data. Usage:
TCPServer.exe [args]
Args:
--HOST: #Default 0.0.0.0
--PORT: #Default 23
--GUI #Show Windows GUI #Default False

License: No restrictions. Go grab a beer ;)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
